page.description: Moves the focus up as if the user pressed the "Up" cursor key.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.UP() method moves the focus up as if the user had pressed the Up key.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script moves to the previous field on the form:
